00014 namespace hope::memory {
00015 
00019     class small_object_allocator final {
00020         using allocator_list = std::vector<fixed_allocator>;
00021     public:
00022         small_object_allocator(const small_object_allocator&) = delete;
00023         small_object_allocator(small_object_allocator&&) = delete;
00024         small_object_allocator& operator=(const small_object_allocator&) = delete;
00025         small_object_allocator& operator=(small_object_allocator&&) = delete;
00026 
00031         static small_object_allocator& instance();
00032 
00038         void deallocate(void* ptr, std::size_t size) noexcept;
00039 
00044         [[nodiscard]] void* allocate(std::size_t size) noexcept;
00045 
00046     private:
00053         fixed_allocator* find_allocator(std::size_t size) noexcept;
00054 
00060         fixed_allocator* create_allocator(std::size_t size) noexcept;
00061 
00066         void clear();
00067 
00072         void initialize_allocators();
00073 
00074         small_object_allocator();
00075         ~small_object_allocator();
00076 
00077         allocator_list m_allocator_list;                         // sorted vector (ascending), contains all available allocators
00078         std::size_t m_chunk_size{ config::ChunkSize };           // the number of blocks that one chunk contains
00079         std::size_t m_max_object_size{ config::MaxObjectSize };  // the max size of object, that is considered small
00080 
00081         friend class sm_allocator_reset;
00082     };
